statements: SELECT * FROM user_generated_content;
SELECT id, user_id, content, created_at FROM user_generated_content;
SELECT id, content, user_id, created_at FROM user_generated_content;
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, content FROM user_generated_content WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, content FROM user_generated_content WHERE id > 5 AND user_id = 3
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY user_id ASC, created_at DESC
SELECT id, created_at FROM user_generated_content WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 1 AND content LIKE '%example%'
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content, created_at FROM annotations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, user_id, content FROM annotations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE date_created = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, note_text FROM notes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT id, content FROM annotations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM notes WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM notes GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM user_annotations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, annotation_text FROM user_annotations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, note_text, created_at FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT id, content_description FROM ar_learning_content WHERE id > 100;

SELECT user_id, annotation_text FROM user_annotations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, annotation_text FROM user_annotations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_content WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, note_text FROM user_notes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM annotations;
SELECT user_id, content FROM annotations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM notes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM notes WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM annotations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM notes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT app_name, platform FROM learning_applications WHERE version > 2.0;
SELECT user_id, content FROM annotations WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT note_id, user_id, title FROM Notes WHERE title LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
